name: Landit Bandit
description:
Finally!! The 3D chopper game of the century has landed exclusively on the PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system.

Meet the dubious art thief Lander and the laid-back native Marley. Stranded on a tropical island with an invaluable briefcase full of DaVinci drawings, they take to the skies in a wooden helicopter. On their epic journey back to the Big City they are captured by "Don Tux" and the mafia penguins. They help the beautiful Island Babe and run into some quite mad cannibals, all while learning new ways to maneuver the most dangerous taxi of all time-the Helivinci.

Intuitive controls put you in charge of the most dangerous taxi vehicle, in this unique PlayStation®3 system title. Landit Bandit is aimed at anyone who likes physics based games, flight simulators, or anyone that wants to play something different, because we guarantee you have never played anything like this before.
